solution_line_template: Helen won twice as many games as Betsy's {betsy_games} so Helen won {helen_multiplier}*{betsy_games} = <<{helen_multiplier}*{betsy_games}={helen_games}>>{helen_games} games
Susan won three times as many games as Betsy's {betsy_games} so Susan won {susan_multiplier}*{betsy_games} = <<{susan_multiplier}*{betsy_games}={susan_games}>>{susan_games} games
When you combine their wins, together they won {betsy_games}+{helen_games}+{susan_games} = <<{betsy_games}+{helen_games}+{susan_games}={total_games}>>{total_games} games total
